pages.text: Juicy and delicious, chew carefully, leaving only the enticing aroma of tiny charred bones and meat between your teeth.$(br)Grants the consumer Frog Leg (60s), Regeneration II (20s)

pages.title: Frog Leg Sandwich
pages.text: Recognized as a delicacy in some countries, you can taste rustic tones and marsh flavors from it.$(br)What do you mean meatballs have lower priority than sandwiches?
